definitions.text: confinement of a prisoner in isolation from other prisoners

examples: a man of a solitary disposition

definitions.text: of plants and animals; not growing or living in groups or colonies

examples: he was alone when we met him
she is alone much of the time
the lone skier on the mountain
a lonely fisherman stood on a tuft of gravel

definitions.text: being the only one; single and isolated from others
examples: the lone doctor in the entire county
a solitary speck in the sky
a trail leading to an unfrequented lake
